title: Bob Hoffmeyer
text: Robert Frank Hoffmeyer (born July 27, 1955) is a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a> former professional <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> player. He played in the <a href="National%20Hockey%20League">National Hockey League</a> (NHL) for the <a href="Chicago%20Blackhawks">Chicago Black Hawks</a>, <a href="Philadelphia%20Flyers">Philadelphia Flyers</a>, and <a href="New%20Jersey%20Devils">New Jersey Devils</a>.
